alternative_title: Find out if you're entitled to legal aid
introduction:
Use this calculator to check if you can get legal aid, which could help pay for legal advice, mediation or representation in court.

You'll be asked general questions about your legal problem and your financial situation.
more_information:
%Using this calculator does not guarantee you will get legal aid - it's just a guide.%

This calculator can only be used for non-criminal ('civil') cases. If you've been charged with a crime, ask your solicitor or barrister if you are able to get legal aid.

If you’re under 18, your eligibility for legal aid might depend on your parents’ or guardians’ income, depending on your problem.
overview: Use this tool to check if you can get legal aid, which can help pay for legal advice, mediation or representation in court if you can’t afford it.
title: Legal aid eligibility calculator
